de.sciss.jcollider
Class ControlDesc

java.lang.Object
  de.sciss.jcollider.ControlDesc

public class ControlDesc
extends Object

A descriptor class for a control UGen, similar to SClang's ControlName class. Note that the lag parameter is currently unused.

Version:
0.2, 11-Sep-05 (some countries are still at war)
Author:
Hanns Holger Rutz
